name: Abba Centrum Hotel

reviews.text: We stayed here three nights in July, my wife and I and our 9 year old son. 60 euros pr. night. The location is good, in the centre of the city with a big supermarket across the street. Theres parking in the basement (13 euros extra pr. night). The hotel seems very new. Our room was spacious, clean with good beds and a big pull-out for our son. It was airconditioned with a very nice bathroom. The staff speaks english and is very helpful.
reviews.title: Great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You haveto pay for WI-FI. Breakfast not included. No pool.
reviews.title: Good - but no atmosphere

reviews.text: Abba Centrum Hotel was comfortable and good value for money. I must say that I expected a little better location - and the view from the room was 0. Thumps up for the service, cleanliness and breakfast.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Positives: Hotel close to the Central Bus station, train stations, and also airport bus stop which was down the road. Close to the main shopping strips. The hotel itself was very good for a 3 star, more 4 star as it was clean, facilities were great, room was great!
reviews.title: Nice Modern hotel, close to Central bus station.

reviews.text: Negative: Hotel is 15 minutes walk from the main area on the port, but it's not too bad if you're mobile.
reviews.title: Loved this gem of a hotel.....

likes.liked: — the helpfullnes of all the staff and the comfrot of all the areas

reviews.text: Just returned from a 3 night stay at the Abba Centrum in Alicante -this was rated no.1 by Trip Advisor and can see why. The Hotel is ideally situated in the centre of Alicante, walking distance from the harbour, restaurants, shops, tram stop and bus station. All the staff are so helpful and the bedrooms are immaculate with flat screen plasma wall mounted tv, lovely modern bathroom with more than enough toiletries, fridge with mini bar and the bedroom was very well lit for reading with lamps and spots on the ceiling. The room was very quiet and the bed was comfy. Breakfast was a feast with cereals, rolls, cheeses, bacon, smoked salmon, pastries, cakes, yoghurt etc. and even diabetic foods. Just across the road is a large supermarket. The airport bus runs to the bus station which is 100 or so yards away but we took taxis which were 20 euros form the airport and 14 euros back.
reviews.title: A lucky find

reviews.text: I would not hesitate to stay there again.
reviews.title: Very good, reliable stay

description: Within 1.5 km of Postiguet Beach and Santa Bárbara Castle, this stylish hotel in central Alicante offers a sauna, gym and a steam bath. The furnished sun terrace is surrounded by plants. Featuring modern décor, all rooms at the Abba Centrum Alicante have air conditioning, free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Some also have a hydromassage shower or bath. The Abba Centrum serves a buffet breakfast on the terrace, while the Aitana restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. A bar-café in the lobby shows sports events on a large-screen TV. The hotel is set in Alicante's commercial district. The Abba has easy access to the A-7 motorway and is a 15-minute drive from Alicante Airport. The city's train and bus stations are 500 metres away.
